extension.summary: The Royal We is about simplicity and sources.
extension.description: The Royal We is getting better then ever. It's all about simplicity and lots of sources. No settings. No configuration (except for a Trakt.tv account if you have one).

extension.news: [B]1.3.8 Update fix I Fixed Trakt.api some users got failed should be fixed [/B] [CR] This is The Last Version Dudehere Made - no one knows if he is coming back
